org.opends.server.core

Interface PersistentSearch.CancellationCallback

  • Enclosing class:
    PersistentSearch

    public static interface PersistentSearch.CancellationCallback
    A cancellation call-back which can be used by work-flow element implementations in order to register for resource cleanup when a persistent search is cancelled.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void persistentSearchCancelled(PersistentSearch psearch)
      The provided persistent search has been cancelled.

    • Method Detail

      • persistentSearchCancelled

        void persistentSearchCancelled(PersistentSearch psearch)
        The provided persistent search has been cancelled. Any resources associated with the persistent search should be released.
        Parameters:
        psearch - The persistent search which has just been cancelled.
